title: What should I write on a birthday card to a close international friend of 2 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you know what you wish for your close friend? Do you know what they wish for? Are you being cautious because your friend comes from a different culture? You can be both sincere and appropriate by acknowledging your happy friendship, and perhaps cite a shared experience that you bonded over. Keep it short and to the point, that you’re psyched they were born, they’re the best, and wish them the very best of the coming year.
write what your heart tells you to. if we were compared, your obviously the one who knows more about this person than i do. wish them the very best in life and anything you come up with
